Here is a bullet list of the required concrete visual elements:

*   Hallway perspective
*   Office setting
*   Right-side full glass wall
*   Meeting room (visible through the glass wall)
*   Person presenting (inside the meeting room)
*   Projected PowerPoint slide (visible inside the meeting room)
*   Slide title text: "User Retention Insights"
*   Slide bullet point text: "7-day retention ↑ from 35% → 47%"
*   Slide bullet point text: "Key driver: in-app onboarding flow"
*   Slide bullet point text: "Most active cohort: Gen Z (18–24)"
*   Slide bullet point text: "Retention gap in Android users"
*   Slide bullet point text: "Action item: A/B test notifications"
*   Left-side window
*   Cityscape visible through window
*   Dusk lighting
